responses: Hello! I'm here to help you with deceased account claims. How can I assist you today?
Hi there! Welcome to the Claims Platform. What would you like to know?
This platform helps you claim assets from deceased accounts. We guide you through document submission, verification, and asset discovery to ensure a smooth claims process.
To start a claim: 1) Create an account or log in, 2) Click 'Start New Claim', 3) Provide deceased person's details, 4) Upload required documents. Our team will guide you through each step.

You'll typically need: Death Certificate, Your ID (passport/driver's license), Proof of relationship (marriage/birth certificate), and any account statements if available. All documents should be clear JPG, PNG, or PDF files.
A certified death certificate is required. It must be an official document from the relevant government authority. You can upload it as a JPG, PNG, or PDF file.
Document verification typically takes 2-5 business days. Asset discovery may take 2-4 weeks depending on the number of institutions involved. Complex cases may require additional time.
You can check your claim status anytime from your Dashboard. Each claim shows its current stage: Started → Documents Uploaded → Under Review → Verified → Approved.
For uploads: Use JPG, PNG, or PDF files only. Maximum file size is 10MB. Ensure the document is clear and readable. If issues persist, try a different browser or contact support.
Our OCR (Optical Character Recognition) technology automatically extracts text from your documents. This speeds up verification but human reviewers always confirm the accuracy.
Our trained reviewers manually verify each document against official records. They check authenticity, legibility, and completeness. You'll be notified if additional information is needed.
After document verification, we search for assets across banks, insurance companies, investment firms, and other institutions. We'll notify you of any discovered assets on your dashboard.
Once assets are discovered, you can initiate a claim from your dashboard. Select the asset, confirm your details, and our team will coordinate with the institution for transfer.
Our fee structure is transparent. Basic claims have no upfront cost. We only charge a small percentage upon successful asset recovery. Contact support for detailed fee information.
Your data is protected with bank-level encryption. We comply with all data protection regulations. Documents are stored securely and only accessed by authorized reviewers.
You can reach our support team by clicking 'Escalate to Support' in the help menu, or use the support form. Our team typically responds within 24 hours.
For login issues, try 'Forgot Password' on the login page. If your account is locked, please contact support with your registered email. We'll help you regain access.
Documents may be rejected for: poor image quality, incomplete information, or authenticity concerns. Check the rejection reason in your dashboard and upload a clearer copy.
Yes, you can file multiple claims for different deceased individuals. Each claim is processed independently. Start a new claim session for each person.
Acceptable relationship proofs include: Marriage certificates, Birth certificates, Court orders, Legal guardianship documents, or Notarized affidavits in some cases.
We handle international claims, though they may require additional documentation and take longer to process. Contact support for guidance on specific country requirements.
If you're the estate executor, please upload Letters Testamentary or Letters of Administration along with other documents. This authorizes you to act on behalf of the estate.
We also handle loan and debt discovery. If the deceased had outstanding loans, you can view them in your dashboard. Some debts may need to be settled from the estate.
After settling a loan or debt, upload the receipt through your dashboard. Select the loan, click 'Upload Receipt', and attach the payment confirmation document.
Administrators can view complete audit logs of all actions. This ensures transparency and accountability throughout the claims process.
For urgent matters, use our 'Escalate to Support' feature. Mark your ticket as high priority, and our team will respond within 4 hours during business hours.
You can view the complete claims process flowchart on the 'Process Flow' page. It shows all steps from registration to asset transfer.
Before starting a claim, you'll need to provide consent for us to verify documents and search for assets. This is required by law and protects all parties involved.
You're welcome! If you have more questions, feel free to ask anytime. Good luck with your claim!
Thank you for using our platform. We're here 24/7 if you need assistance. Take care!
